note: This term does not appear to be a recognized English word. You may be looking for 'antinepotism' (opposition to nepotism) or 'antipyretic' (fever-reducing medication).

suggestions.definition: opposition to or prevention of nepotism (favoritism to relatives)
examples: The company implemented antinepotism policies to ensure fair hiring practices.
Aspirin is commonly used as an antipyretic to lower body temperature.

pronunciation.note: No established pronunciation for this non-standard term
